channel.title: One big question list!
channel.description:
Okay starting off with my millions of questions for RSCA.
[ol][li]How do we add new NPCS in there?[/li] [li]How do we add new Items in there?[/li] [li]How do we make ourselves admin (I tried 1,2,3,4,5 it just doesnt work anymore)[/li] [li]How do we make new Admin Ranks like Chat mod or NPC mod?[/li] [li]How do we edit the existing admin ranks to show what you want it to do to anyone with that rank (LIKE SHOW CROWN OR SOMETHING)[/li] [li]How do we change the forum stuff.. its like nothing is connecting to my MYSQL at all.. not the server not even the forums.. I change the paypal email the web admins email EVERYTHING... and still it doesnt change even though database did.[/li] [li]Can you make me just a foggy background for the RSCA Client?[/li] [li]In RSCD forums how do we access the admin index because it says I do not have permission even thought I am rank ADMINISTRATOR[/li][/ol]
And thats about it... please help the best you can!
*EDIT: FIXED THE SHOP PROBLEM..

item.title: One big question list!
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

I want to add my own items and npcs… by like copying a goblin and making it a new npc… IDK how to do that… or adding new ITEMS with new sprites… and I just need the shops fixed and background better and the RSCD Forums completely fixed… PLEASE ANYONE HELP!! Imsocruel give me your msn on PM?

Read full topic

item.title: One big question list!
item.dc:creator: @imsocruel imsocruel
item.description:
@imsocruel wrote:

lol ive been the only one answering these :D, i personally dont know most of these errors/help questions
to add npcs to area, edit npcloc.xml then compress
same for items but do it for itemloc

or are you talking about how to add new npcs? if so i have no clue

Read full topic

item.title: One big question list!
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

Im used to hard shit… I know I can conquer this but I just really need some support team… Or you.

Read full topic

item.title: One big question list!
item.dc:creator: @imsocruel imsocruel
item.description:
@imsocruel wrote:

if you dont know this (sorry if i offend you)
you should switch to easy rsc, alot easier,
all you have to do is click start server, log in with any user and pass
log out, change your rank in the players folder to 4 and your admin

Read full topic

item.title: One big question list!
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

Okay starting off with my millions of questions for RSCA.

[ol][li]How do we add new NPCS in there?[/li]
[li]How do we add new Items in there?[/li]
[li]How do we make ourselves admin (I tried 1,2,3,4,5 it just doesnt work anymore)[/li]
[li]How do we make new Admin Ranks like Chat mod or NPC mod?[/li]
[li]How do we edit the existing admin ranks to show what you want it to do to anyone with that rank (LIKE SHOW CROWN OR SOMETHING)[/li]
[li]How do we change the forum stuff… its like nothing is connecting to my MYSQL at all… not the server not even the forums… I change the paypal email the web admins email EVERYTHING… and still it doesnt change even though database did.[/li]
[li]Can you make me just a foggy background for the RSCA Client?[/li]
[li]In RSCD forums how do we access the admin index because it says I do not have permission even thought I am rank ADMINISTRATOR[/li][/ol]

And thats about it… please help the best you can!

*EDIT: FIXED THE SHOP PROBLEM…

Read full topic
